Name: team_size_limit
Description: Team size must not exceed 9 members

Name: project_budget_limit
Description: Budget must not exceed the allocated amount

Name: sprint_duration_fixed
Description: Sprint duration must be exactly 2 weeks

Name: worker_skill_requirement
Description: Each task must be assigned to a worker with the required skill

Name: blocker_resolution_time
Description: Blockers must be resolved within 2 days

Name: scrum_master_experience
Description: Scrum Master must have at least 2 years of experience

Name: user_story_priority
Description: Only high-priority user stories can be in the sprint backlog

Name: release_plan_feature_limit
Description: Release plan must not include more than 5 features

Name: velocity_calculation
Description: Velocity must be calculated from the last 3 sprints

Name: roadmap_milestone_limit
Description: Roadmap must have at least 3 milestones
